1208430.name: Framing Dawes Demo
1208430.description:
Join Bay Dawes and her dead pet rabbit, Dink on their adventure to find missing memories and to unravel the mystery of who is...

Framing Dawes


Features
​
- A 20 minutee demo of the story-driven episodic dark 2D point and click fairy-tale adventure game split into three parts.

- Explore the beautiful hand-drawn world of Dawes.

- Cast a spell to reveal a hidden location.

- Play as Bay Dawes.

- Experience paranormal activity.

- Meet a few of the strange and intriguing characters to interact with.
